author: Nintendo of America
description:
Introducing Vendetta, Overwatch’s first-ever melee Damage Hero! Coming to Overwatch 2 on Nintendo Switch soon: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/overwatch-2-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01  

She is the Wolf. She is La Lupa. You're right to fear her. 

With her Palatine Fang greatsword in hand, along with her lightning-fast mobility, Vendetta dominates close-range encounters with raw power and unparalleled precision. Dash in and demolish your foes using Whirlwind Dash, Soaring Slice, and Projected Edge, all while building attack and movement speed through her Onslaught passive. And when you’re ready to deliver the final blow, her Sundering Blade Ultimate obliterates enemies directly in front of you. 

Claim your vengeance as Vendetta during her limited-time Hero Trial Nov 26–Dec 1. See what the future holds for the newest Hero when she officially arrives in Season 20 on Dec 9, 2025! 

#NintendoSwitch #Overwatch2 

Visit Nintendo.
title: Overwatch 2 – Vendetta Gameplay Trailer – Nintendo Switch
